description: Ultra-reliable flight control system - Cleanroom for safety-critical aviation software
systemDescription: Real-time flight control system for commercial aircraft autopilot. Includes altitude hold, heading control, auto-throttle, and auto-land capabilities. Must meet DO-178C Level A (catastrophic failure conditions). System interfaces with aircraft sensors (altimeter, gyroscope, GPS, airspeed) and actuators (elevators, ailerons, rudder, throttle). Required to maintain flight envelope under all normal and degraded sensor conditions.
notes: DO-178C Level A requires formal methods and exhaustive testing
All critical control loops require mathematical correctness proofs
Usage model based on worst-case flight scenarios (turbulence, sensor failures)
MTTF target extremely high due to catastrophic failure consequences
Incremental development allows proving correctness of each control loop independently
